wikipedia_page.main: Rémy Noë (born 8 December 1974), is a British painter, a member of the international art movement Stuckism and co-founder of the Maidstone Stuckists.

response: She spends her time divided between Camden in London and Paris."'Venus and Mars', Elsa Dax", Walker Art Gallery, National Museums Liverpool. Retrieved 3 September 2008. She is now a full-time artist. As well as painting her own work, she is also a collector of other Stuckist paintings by Ella Guru, Charles Thomson, Bill Lewis, Philip Absolon, Rémy Noë and Ruth Stein.
*Rémy Noë (born 1974), English painter of French-Dutch descent
